trans-unit.source: Wire payment
trans-unit.target: Pagamento por transferencia bancaria

trans-unit.source: Accept payments by bank transfer.
trans-unit.target: Aceptar pagos por transferencia bancaria.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure about removing these details?
trans-unit.target: Estás segura de querer eliminar estes datos?

trans-unit.source: Account owner and account details must be configured before using this module.
trans-unit.target: O titular e os datos da conta deben configurarse antes de empregar este módulo.

trans-unit.source: No currency has been set for this module.
trans-unit.target: Non se estableceu ningunha moeda para este módulo.

trans-unit.source: Account details are required.
trans-unit.target: Requírense os datos da conta.

trans-unit.source: Account owner is required.
trans-unit.target: Requírese o titular da conta.

trans-unit.source: Account details
trans-unit.target: Detalles da conta

trans-unit.source: Account owner
trans-unit.target: Titular da conta

trans-unit.source: Such as bank branch, IBAN number, BIC, etc.
trans-unit.target: Coma sucursal bancaria, número IBAN, BIC, etc.

trans-unit.source: Bank address
trans-unit.target: Enderezo do banco

trans-unit.source: Customization
trans-unit.target: Persoalización

trans-unit.source: Reservation period
trans-unit.target: Período de reserva

trans-unit.source: Number of days the items remain reserved
trans-unit.target: Número de días nos que os artigos permanecen reservados

trans-unit.source: Information to the customer
trans-unit.target: Información para a clientela

trans-unit.source: Information on the bank transfer (processing time, starting of the shipping...)
trans-unit.target: Información da transferencia bancaria (tempo de procesamento, comezo do envío...)

trans-unit.source: Display the invitation to pay in the order confirmation page
trans-unit.target: Amosar a invitación a pagar na páxina de confirmación de pedido

trans-unit.source: Your country's legislation may require you to send the invitation to pay by email only. Disabling the option will hide the invitation on the confirmation page.
trans-unit.target: A lexislación do teu país pode obrigarche a enviar a invitación a pagar só por correo electrónico. Desactivar esta opción agochará a invitación na páxina de confirmación.

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to accept secure payments by bank wire.
trans-unit.target: Este módulo permíteche aceptar pagamentos seguros mediante transferencia bancaria.

trans-unit.source: If the client chooses to pay by bank wire, the order status will change to 'Waiting for Payment'.
trans-unit.target: Se a clienta escolle pagar por transferencia bancaria, o estado da encomenda mudará a "Agardando polo Pagamento".

trans-unit.source: That said, you must manually confirm the order upon receiving the bank wire.
trans-unit.target: Porén, debes confirmar manualmente a encomenda tras recibi-la transferencia bancaria.
